Data Fields
i2c_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Inter-Integrated Circuit (I2C) Master

I2C IO Attributes. More...

#include <i2c.h>

Detailed Description

This structure defines how the control structure for configuring the I2C port.

Data Fields

u8 pin_assign
 The GPIO configuration to use (see LPC17XXDEV)
 
u32 bitrate
 The I2C bitrate.
